message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.SI, cs.SY

The paper proposes a deep learning-based approach for solar irradiance forecasting, which falls under the domain of machine learning and artificial intelligence. The use of recurrent neural networks and long-short-term memory networks suggests that the paper may belong to the sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper involves the development of an end-to-end pipeline, which may suggest that it belongs to the sub-category of cs.SY (Systems and Control). The paper also involves the use of neural networks for prediction, which may suggest that it belongs to the sub-categories of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Finally, the paper involves the application of the proposed approach to geographically scattered sites across the United States, which may suggest that it belongs to the sub-category of cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
